mapper.select: select u.user_number, u.user_nickname, n.notice_number, n.notice_title, n.notice_content, n.notice_date, n.notice_count from tbl_user u join tbl_notice n on u.user_number = n.user_number

select m.member_number, m.member_id, b.board_number , b.board_title , b.board_content , b.board_date , b.board_read_count from tbl_member m join tbl_board b on m.member_number = b.member_number order by board_number desc limit #{startRow}, #{rowCount}
